content: I Would greatly appreciate if someone can provide an insight on whether there's a mandate for a "Payer" to provide Clinical data (condition, procedure and medication) from the claims data? If yes, then point to documentation.
A mandate for what country? This is an international forum
Then you need to check this, from CMS: https://www.cms.gov/newsroom/fact-sheets/interoperability-and-patient-access-fact-sheet
